content.query:
SELECT product_code, AVG(DaysInWarehouse) AS AverageDaysInWarehouse
FROM Inventory
GROUP BY product_code
ORDER BY AverageDaysInWarehouse DESC;

SELECT product_code, DATE_TRUNC('week', Date) AS WeekStart, AVG(DaysInWarehouse) AS AverageDaysInWarehouse
FROM Inventory
GROUP BY product_code, WeekStart
ORDER BY AverageDaysInWarehouse DESC;

SELECT product_code, DATE_TRUNC('month', Date) AS MonthStart, AVG(DaysInWarehouse) AS AverageDaysInWarehouse
FROM Inventory
GROUP BY product_code, MonthStart
ORDER BY AverageDaysInWarehouse DESC;
